official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that Members of the House of Representatives may not employ any individual who is a relative of any Member of the Congress.

summary.text: Prohibits Members of the House of Representatives from employing any individual who is a relative of any Member of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that Members of the House of Representatives may not employ any individual who is a relative of any Member of the Congress.
